name: Sirby
desc: Conformal map of $$f(z) = 2 \cosh(z)$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of \(\pi\). It is based on an image of my cat Sirby.

name: Ooze
desc: Domain coloring of the 32nd iterate of $$f(z) = \tan\left(\frac{1}{z}\right)e^{i|z|}$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 5 / 2.

name: Pollock
desc: Domain coloring of the 32nd iterate of $$f(z) = \log\left(\frac{(1-i)z^6 + (7+i)z}{2z^5 + 6}\right)$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 2.

name: Needle
desc: Domain coloring of the 8th iterate of $$f(z) = \Im(z)\log(z)$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 2.

name: Cannon
desc: Conformal map of $$f(z) = \frac{1}{z^2}$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 1. It is based on an image of my friend Cannon.

name: Misiurewicz
desc: Coloring of the Mandelbrot set, which is given by $$z_{n+1} = z_n^2 + c$$ centered around the point $$M_{23, 2} \approx -0.77568377 + 0.13646737i$$ with an apothem of 0.0000001.

name: Acid Pitchfork
desc: Domain coloring of the 8th iterate of $$f(z) = e^{i \arg(z)} \tanh\left(\frac{1}{\sinh^2(1 / z)}\right)$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 2.

name: Triangle Dragon
desc: Domain coloring of the 32nd iterate of $$f(z) = \log\left(\frac{(1-i)z^6 - 4iz^3}{2z^6}\right)$$ centered around -0.3i with an apothem of 3.

name: Roots of Unity
desc: Domain coloring of $$f(z) = z^3 - 1$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 2.

name: Strawberry Banana
desc: Domain coloring of the 32nd iterate of $$f(z) = \log\left(\frac{z + i}{z^2}\right)$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 2.

name: Whirlpool
desc: Conformal map of $$f(z) = 3ze^{i|z|}$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 2. It is based on a checkerboard image.

name: Branch Cut
desc: Domain coloring of $$f(z) = \sqrt{z}$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 2.

name: Blossom
desc: Conformal map of $$f(z) = \frac{1}{z}$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of \(\pi / 8\). It is based on the cherry blossom emoji.

name: Long Eli
desc: Conformal map of $$f(z) = \frac{1}{z}$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 1. It is based on a distorted image of me.

name: Iridescence
desc: Domain coloring of the 8th iterate of $$f(z) = e^{i \Im(z)} \tan\left(\frac{1}{z}\right)$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 2.

name: Burning Ship
desc: Coloring of the burning-ship fractal, which is given by $$z_{n+1} = (|\Re(z_n)| + |\Im(z_n)|i)^2 + c$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 2.2.

name: Sleepy Cleo
desc: Conformal map of $$f(z) = \frac{1}{z}$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 1.1. It is based on an image of my cat Cleo.

name: Under Construction
desc: Domain coloring of \(\log(f^{(32)}(z)\) where $$f(z) = \sin\left(\frac{1}{z}\right)$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 2.

name: Carpet
desc: Domain coloring of the 16th iterate of $$f(z) = \frac{\cos(z)}{\sin(z^4 - 1)}$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 2.

name: Pastel Oology
desc: Domain coloring of the 8th iterate of $$f(z) = e^{i|z|}\log(z)$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 2.

name: Essential Singularity
desc: Domain coloring of $$f(z) = e^{1 / z}$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 1/2. Notice that $$e^{1 / z} = 1 + \frac{1}{z} + \frac{1}{2z^2} + \frac{1}{6z^3} + \dots$$ and so the function has an essential singularity at 0.

name: Ex Nihilo
desc: Domain coloring of the 8th iterate of $$f(z) = e^{i \Im(z^2)}(z^2 + i)$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 2.

name: Jake & Maggie
desc: Conformal map of $$f(z) = \sum_{n = 0}^{256} z^{2^n}$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 1. It is based on an image of my friend Jake, and another friend's dog named Maggie.

name: Grace
desc: Domain coloring of the 22nd iterate of $$f(z) = e^z\arg(z)$$ centered around \(\pi i / 2\) with an apothem of 0.4.

name: Iterated Map 1
desc: Domain coloring of the 32nd iterate of $$f(z) = \log\left(\frac{(1-i)z^4+(7+i)z}{2z^5+6}\right)$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 2.

name: Iterated Map 2
desc: Domain coloring of the 16th iterate of $$f(z) = \frac{\sin(z)}{z^2}$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 0.15.

name: Iterated Map 3
desc: Domain coloring of the 8th iterate of $$f(z) = \Re(z) \log(z) e^{i \arg(z)}$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 2.

name: Kaleidoscope
desc: Domain coloring of \(\log(f^{(16)}(z))\) where $$f(z) = \cos\left(\frac{1}{z}\right)$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 2.

name: Lacunary
desc: Domain coloring of $$f(z) = \sum_{n = 0}^{256} z^{2^n}$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 1. This is an approximation of the lacunary function $$\sum_{n = 0}^{\infty} z^{2^n}$$ and serves as the visualization of such functions on Wikipedia.

name: CMYK
desc: Domain coloring of the 8th iterate of $$f(z) = z - \frac{z^3 - 1}{3z^2}$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 2.

name: Crevice
desc: Domain coloring of the 32nd iterate of $$f(z) = \sin\left(\frac{1}{z}\right)$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 1.07.

name: Tron
desc: Domain coloring of the 64th iterate of $$f(z) = \frac{z}{\left|z^3 - 1\right|}$$ multiplied by $$e^{i \arg(\sin(z^3 - 1))}$$ centered around 0 with an apothem of 1.2.
